data.title: Silent Hill: Revelation 3D
data.text:
Theatrical Poster

Country United States

France Directed by Michael J. Bassett Release Date 2012 Studio Lionsgate Distributor Open Road Films

Lionsgate

Main Cast Character Actor Heather Mason Adelaide Clemens Leonard Wolf Malcolm McDowell Claudia Wolf Carrie-Anne Moss Douglas Cartland Martin Donovan Rose Da Silva Radha Mitchell Christopher Da Silva / Harry Mason Sean Bean Dahlia Gillespie Deborah Kara Unger Travis Grady Peter Outerbridge Vincent Smith Kit Harington Detective Santini Jefferson Brown

Silent Hill: Revelation 3D is a 2012 horror film, a sequel to the 2006 film, and loosely based on the plot of the third Silent Hill game.

The following weapons were used in the film Silent Hill: Revelation 3D:

Smith & Wesson 5946

Heather Mason (Adelaide Clemens) retrieves a Smith & Wesson 5946 pistol from her house after she decides to go to Silent Hill. It is most probably her father's, Harry Mason's (Sean Bean) gun used for protection. Heather loses it after a fight in Silent Hill.

SIG-Sauer P226R

A Detective Cable (Milton Barnes) uses a SIG-Sauer P226 at the Masons' house.

Smith & Wesson Model 60
